_sText:
.::.DEATH_RUN.::.

.:/Author\/IcePick\:.

.:Install Instructions:.
Put the bsp file in-
Program files/Valve/steam/
steamApps/User-name-folder/
Counter-strike-source/cstrike/Maps

.:Details:.
OK The aim of this map is simple,
they should be just 1 terrorist
and the rest should join ct.
the reason for this is that the ct's have
to skillfully make they way through the "Death Run"
while the terrorist triggers all the boobie traps
to stop them before they reach him/her and
find a weapon of they choice to blow the
pesky terrorist away :)
The first ct to reach the terrorist and kill
him/her should join the terrorist team next round
and see how long he/she can keep them ct's
from blowing him/her away :)

Add these cvars into your server.cfg or
manualy into console(rcon if srcds)

mp_autoteambalance 0
mp_limitteams 0

Adding these cvars makes it possible to
have just 1 terrorist and unlimited ct's.

.::.HaVe FuN.::.

.:Dj RobTronic:.
